lines.text: Point about which baton is rotated
Solid figures, rotated about axis passing through center

secText:
Lesson:
1. Calculate net torque using the [OBJ:expsec_i969:moment of inertia and angular acceleration].
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_i970:moment of inertia].
3. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_i970:moment of inertia].
4. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_i972:moment of inertia for common shapes].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37196:Calculate] torque using moment of inertia and angular acceleration.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_torque_law_concepts:Torque, Moment of Inertia, and Angular Acceleration], [OBJ:sum_torque_inertia:Moment of Inertia]
